data.title: Walnut Ridge Cemetery, Jeffersonville Indiana
data.meta_description: Cemetery records of persons buried in Walnut Ridge Cemetery, Jeffersonville, Indiana, compiled by Clark County Genealogical Volunteers, Surnames W
data.text:
What makes us Different?

Single-sourced, not crowd-sourced

Each transcription we publish comes from a single-source, be it the cemetery office, government office, church office, archived document, a tombstone transcriber. Other websites already do an excellent job of crowd-sourcing a single cemetery together. But genealogists also need to see the original records from a single source. That's what we offer.
